LanguageData.Mech_BigAvtomaton.label: Cyclops
LanguageData.Mech_BigAvtomaton.description: A large, slow-moving mechanoid of a newer design. A menacing eye-like glow emits from the front as it rumbles around on several mechanical tracks. The armor is made of several alloys, strong enough to withstand the harshest punishment.
LanguageData.Mech_BigAvtomaton.tools.head.label: Eye camera
LanguageData.Mech_SmallAvtomaton.label: Snipper
LanguageData.Mech_SmallAvtomaton.description: A small mechanoid with a barrel-shaped body covered in small protrusions. It uses many tiny legs for movement, but in spite of this they are very fast and maneuverable. They use a similar alloy for armor as the larger Cyclops, but not nearly as thick.
LanguageData.Mech_SmallAvtomaton.tools.head.label: head
